About

Superb Meteors is written and produced by Rogin Farrer.

Tools

Superb Meteors is primarily published from a 2011 MacBook Pro.

The site runs on Jekyll with Github Pages for hosting. The type, delivered by Typekit, is set in Rooney, Myriad Pro, and Courier Prime.

Superb Meteors’ design was created by yours truly with the help of Brackets and f.lux.

Feel free to check out the style guide.

Contact

Email: rogin@roginfarrer.com

Twitter: @RoginFarrer

Theater portfolio: roginfarrer.com

Rogin Farrer

Theater-maker, pixel-pusher, and writer based in Boston.
I enjoy story-telling, technology, and good coffee.
